AppDB.Name: METER_ING_DATABASE_MEMORY_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table maps for each ingress database consecutive banks

AppDB.Name: METER_EGR_DATABASE_MEMORY_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table maps for each egress database consecutive banks

AppDB.Name: METER_ING_PTR_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table maps from ingress object stat id into specific entry in the meter memory space.

AppDB.Name: METER_EGR_PTR_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table maps from egress object stat id into specific entry in the meter memory space.

AppDB.Name: METER_PROFILE_SET_FOR_SMALL_ENGINE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table maps each policer_id into its profile it is made for the small engines DB (DB_A)

AppDB.Name: METER_GLOBAL_SHARING_FLAG_SMALL_ENGINES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table defines the coupling flags for each 4 meters group. it is made in the small engines DB (DB_A)

AppDB.Name: METER_PROFILE_SET_FOR_BIG_ENGINE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table maps each policer_id into its profile it is made for the big engines DB (DB_C)

AppDB.Name: METER_GLOBAL_SHARING_FLAG_BIG_ENGINES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table defines the coupling flags for each 4 meters group. it is made in the small engines DB (DB_C)

AppDB.Name: METER_ING_GENERAL_SETTINGS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table holds ingress meter general settings.

AppDB.Name: METER_EGR_GENERAL_SETTINGS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table holds egress meter general settings.

AppDB.Name: METER_FWD_TYPE_GROUP_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table map the ingress fwd type into expansion groups (offset)

AppDB.Name: METER_ING_STAT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table define the settings of the ingress debug counters

AppDB.Name: METER_EGR_STAT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table define the settings of the egress debug counters

AppDB.Name: METER_GLOBAL_GENERAL_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table holds global meter general configuration.

AppDB.Name: METER_INGRESS_DB_GENERAL_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table holds the configuration per ingress meter database.

AppDB.Name: METER_EGRESS_DB_GENERAL_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table holds the configuration per egress meter database.

AppDB.Name: METER_GLOBAL_PROFILE_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table holds global meter profile configuration.

AppDB.Name: METER_ING_PROFILE_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table holds ingress meter profile configuration.

AppDB.Name: METER_EGR_PROFILE_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table holds egress meter profile configuration.

AppDB.Name: METER_GLOBAL_COMPENSATION_BY_PORT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following holds pp port compensation profiles for global meter

AppDB.Name: METER_ING_COMPENSATION_BY_PORT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following holds pp port compensation profiles for ingress meter

AppDB.Name: METER_ING_RESOLVE_COLOR_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following configure the ingress resolved table

AppDB.Name: METER_EGR_RESOLVE_COLOR_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following configure the egress resolved table

AppDB.Name: METER_ING_FINAL_RESOLVE_COLOR_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following configure the ingress final resolved table

AppDB.Name: METER_EGR_FINAL_RESOLVE_COLOR_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following configure the egress final resolved table

AppDB.Name: METER_PROTOCOL_TYPE_IS_ETH
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following configure if the fwd type is Eth, used for Statistics_Object10 calculation

AppDB.Name: METER_STATISTIC_10_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following configure the values of statistics object 10

AppDB.Name: METER_INGRESS_PORT_HEADER_COMPENSATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table sets In-PP-Port Header-Compensation-Profile delta value for meter

AppDB.Name: METER_GLOBAL_COUNTERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table holds meter global counters - red/black/rejected

AppDB.Name: METER_EGRESS_DISCARD_ENABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table enable egress discard (drop) per dp
